author: joannewright79
title: HP announces the new Chromebook x360 11 G1 for students
text:
Education has been a huge focus for Google’s Chromebooks, and it’s definitely paid off. Case in point, Chromebooks were the top selling devices in 2016 in Sweden’s school system, edging out competition from Microsoft and Apple. 38% of device sales in Swedish classrooms were Chromebooks, which was nearly double from 18% the year before.
